setting: You are in an Evil factory that manufactures pure evil.  this is not a metaphor, it has learned how to manufacture the actual essence of evil and evil infused cookies are all the rage.

characters.name: Toblarone
characters.role_description: Toblarone is the CEO of evil corp.  he is super evil.  however, he is also very ticklish

characters.name: Spoon
characters.role_description: Spoon is the head of the evil cookie division.  he is not evil, but he is very good at making evil cookies

characters.name: Sussy Baka
characters.role_description: Sussy Baka is the janitor.  he is very sussy and very baka

characters.name: Watt
characters.role_description: Watt is the lead evil essence scientist and the only one that truly understands how to extract it.
